meanings.definition: To remove burrs from (a metal object).
meanings.sent1: He carefully deburred the sharp edges of the metal piece.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic deburred the metal sheet before assembling it.
meanings.sent3: After he deburred the metal, it looked smoother than a baby's bottom.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in deburring was like a sculptor shaping marble.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the deburring tool echoed in the workshop.

meanings.sent1: She deburred the metal yesterday and now it looks perfect.
meanings.sent2: They deburred the edges of the metal part last week.
meanings.sent3: When he deburred the metal, he felt like a time traveler fixing the past.
meanings.sent4: The deburred metal gleamed in the sunlight like a polished gem.
meanings.sent5: The deburred surface felt as smooth as silk under his fingertips.
